body_html:
I believe glog does support vmodule.
That said, I don't think we'll be working on switching the logging implementation/adding a vmodule feature in the near future, so marking this as "Contributions Welcome".

We'll be happy to see pull requests bumping up the log level of existing lines.

Deferring to @martinwicke about whether switching to glog is an option.
body_text:
I believe glog does support vmodule.
That said, I don't think we'll be working on switching the logging implementation/adding a vmodule feature in the near future, so marking this as "Contributions Welcome".
We'll be happy to see pull requests bumping up the log level of existing lines.
Deferring to @martinwicke about whether switching to glog is an option.
body:
I believe [glog](https://github.com/google/glog) does support `vmodule`.
That said, I don't think we'll be working on switching the logging implementation/adding a vmodule feature in the near future, so marking this as "Contributions Welcome".

We'll be happy to see pull requests bumping up the log level of existing lines.

Deferring to @martinwicke about whether switching to glog is an option.
